basicInfo.summary: A full-stack Software Developer with both front-end and back-end skills. Mainly use Java and NodeJS in recent projects. Delivered products for companies from different domains. Advocate agile practice and has a good understanding of domain driven development, micro-service system and so on. Always committed to producing high availability, easy-maintained and secure code. Understanding the practice of DevOps, and go deep into the container and automation deployment, familiar with container-related techniques. Good insight into design thinking and product design. He has a lot of efforts to improve the user experience of the product.

workExperiences.name: Bavarian Motor Work Aftersales
workExperiences.summary: This project is a location-based trip sharing tool. Users, especially for women, can share trips with friends and family in unsecured environments. I led the backend development in the team. This system is based on Java and Spring. In addition to providing the mobile application with an interface for data presentation and data exchange, there is also a need to think deeply about user privacy protection. When first take on the project, I need to refactor the code left over from the previous company. I refactored the overall architecture of the code and introduced the design of micro-services and DDD. Extensive tests have been rewritten to ensure the high availability of code. In-depth design of the application's interface to respond to the instantaneous high volume of network requests generated by large-scale marketing campaigns. Ensure that there are no breakdowns during the campaign promotion.
